altername_name: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe Red Edition
name: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe: Red Edition
overview: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe is a modpack created by FJRoyet and the Deluxe Team that includes all official tracks from Super Mario Kart to Mario Kart 7 in their original order. It also includes tracks from other games (Mario Kart 8, Mario Kart Tour, Diddy Kong Racing, Crash Team Racing, F-Zero, Mickey Speedway USA) and custom fan tracks that the author finds, to date, the best visually, giving a total of 480 circuits and 10 battle arenas. The game is divided into three editions so you can choose according to your taste: - Blue Version: Original characters with new vehicles - Red Version: Original characters with Mario Kart Tour-style skins - Green Version: Customized characters like Sonic , Crash, Kamek or King Bob-omb The three editions have different music and interface depending on their color, but are always consistent with each other and compatible with each other for online (crossplay). There are also different visual changes depending on which edition you are using, such as minimap colors, miniturbo/drift colors and sound effects.
